entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.8.0 Release Notes
entry.summary: We're excited to share that v1.8.0 of BuildBuddy is live on Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy, Enterprise, and Open Source via GitHub, Docker, and our Helm Charts!

entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.5.0 Release Notes
entry.summary: We're excited to share that v1.5.0 of BuildBuddy is live on both Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy and open-source via Github, Docker, and our Helm Charts!

entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.4.0 Release Notes
entry.summary: We're excited to share that v1.4.0 of BuildBuddy is live on both Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy and open-source via Github and Docker!

entry.title: Welcoming George Li, Head of Sales
entry.summary: To fulfill our mission of bringing the world's best developer tools to every company, we're building a team that's ready to work with the world's best enterprises. That's why we're excited to share today that George Li is joining BuildBuddy to lead our enterprise sales efforts as our Head of Sales.

entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.3.0 Release Notes
entry.summary: Excited to share that v1.1.0 of BuildBuddy is live on both Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy and open source via Github and Docker!

entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.1.0 Release Notes
entry.summary: Excited to share that v1.1.0 of BuildBuddy is live on both Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy and open source via Github and Docker!

entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.2.1 Release Notes
entry.summary: Excited to share that v1.2.1 of BuildBuddy is live on both Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy and open source via Github and Docker!

entry.title: BuildBuddy v1.0.6 Release Notes
entry.summary: Excited to share that v1.0.6 of BuildBuddy is live on both Cloud Hosted BuildBuddy and open source via Github and Docker!

entry.title: Introducing BuildBuddy Version 1.0
entry.summary: We released our initial open source version of BuildBuddy to the Bazel community last month and have received a ton of interest, support, and feedback. We really appreciate everyone who's taken the time to kick the tires and try it out!

entry.title: BuildBuddy joins Y Combinator
entry.summary: If you've hung out around developers for any extended period --- you've probably heard "my code is compiling" as an excuse from them when they're slacking off and browsing Hacker News.

entry.title: Meet BuildBuddy
entry.summary: BuildBuddy is a managed Bazel build system --- it brings a Google-style development environment to any company in minutes.
